channel.title: ~ GiraffesPK ~ [[ Spawn || Token ECO || Truly Instant Pking ]]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/moMKR.png[/img]
[b]DO NOT click anything until cache downloads successfully[/b] [i]*If webclient is down please use a downloadable client[/I] [img]http://runenova.com/images/play.png[/img][b][url=http://ihybrid.site50.net]Webclient[/url][/b] [img]http://runenova.com/images/forum.png[/img][b][url=http://giraffespk.tk]Community[/url][/b]
[img]http://runenova.com/images/play.png[/img][b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?n3aa7zqagx9hin3]Client Download *Zip[/url][/b] [img]http://runenova.com/images/play.png[/img][b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?36cye3ne8h199a2]Client Download *JAR[/url][/b]
[img]http://runenova.com/images/play.png[/img][b][url=http://uppit.com/cruiqoqdq96n/GiraffesPK_V1.zip]Client Download *Zip [color=red]*MIRROR[/COLOR][/url][/b] [img]http://runenova.com/images/play.png[/img][b][url=http://uppit.com/6z62m69fu1xe/client.jar]Client Download *JAR [color=red]*MIRROR[/COLOR][/url][/b]
Giraffes are simply the greatest pkers to ever exist. [B]Proof[/B]: [youtube] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=huxDnZs2_OQ]Giraffe Fight - YouTube[/url] [/youtube]
[B][color=red][size=14pt]Server Information:[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] GiraffesPK is an Economic Spawn Server which uses tokens as currency. I have great plans to advance this server into one of the most unique spawn servers in existence. The idea is to have a server in which you can enjoy hassle free pking whilst still having content to enjoy. We also want to capture that feeling you experience after killing someone for a rare item. I mean come on, remember how you felt when you smited out your first whip in scape?? :p
[B][color=red][size=14pt]Content Such As:[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[ul][li][B]Quests [/B]- [I]complete to unlock various things in-game such as items, permissions, etc.[/li] [li][B]Skilling [/B]- [I]trade items obtained from skilling for tokens[/li] [li][B]Minigames [/B]- [I]Earn points you can exchange for items, tokens, etc.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/JDUB[/img]
[B][color=red][size=14pt]Media:[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] [B][color=red]Instant Pking Starter:[/COLOR][/B] [IMG]http://ihybrid.site50.net/Starter.gif[/img] [B][color=red]Click Leveling:[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://ihybrid.site50.net/Click%20Leveling.gif[/img] [B][color=red]Interactive Quest Tab:[/COLOR][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ax4h3.png[/img] [B][color=red]Perfect Switching:[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://img252.imageshack.us/img252/2724/0151.gif[/img]
[B][color=red][size=14pt]Game Guide:[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] [center]
[size=14pt]Korasi's Quest Walkthrough:[/size] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fbYi8b18xAo&feature=plcp]~ GiraffesPK ~ The Korasi's Quest Walkthrough - YouTube[/url]
[size=14pt]PvP Tokens:[/size] Currently the only way to earn PvP Tokens is through Player Killing. Regular members will receive 5 tokens/kill and donators will receive 10 tokens/kill. However, this is only a release bonus. Soon the amount of tokens both regular members and donators receive will be cut in half.
Soon you will be able to earn PvP Tokens through skilling, minigames, questing etc.
[img]http://puu.sh/JUxx[/img]
You can purchase items from shops such as the PvP Token Shop with PvP Tokens
[img]http://puu.sh/JUAu[/img]
[size=14pt]Interactive Quest Tab:[/size]
Click buttons under [b]Gear:[/b] to spawn different gear sets, potions, weapons etc. [b]Red circle[/b] = Shop NPCs [b]Yellow Circle[/b] = Quest NPCs [b]Blue Arrow[/b] = Portal to Jad [b]*note*[/b] Fire Cape is tradable
[img]http://i.imgur.com/AziDX.png[/img]
[size=14pt]Commands:[/size]
[b]:: kdr :: gameguide :: changepassword :: item :: pickup :: players :: forums :: list :: settag[/b]
[size=14pt]NPCs:[/size]
[b]Mandrith[/b]: [img]http://puu.sh/JUmv[/img] [b]Watchtower Wizard[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/JUou[/img] [size=14pt]Altars:[/size]
[b]Red Arrow[/b] = Switch PrayerBooks (Turmoil, Regular) [b]Yellow Arrow[/b] = Switch Magic Books (Ancient Magiks, Lunar, Regular) [b]Blue Arrow[/b] = Restore Prayer Points
[img]http://puu.sh/JUtp[/img]
[/center] [/center]

item.title: ~ GiraffesPK ~ [[ Spawn || Token ECO || Truly Instant Pking ]]
item.dc:creator: @Superaust Superaust
item.description:
@Superaust wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:2, topic:450843”]First off, let me say that I typically don’t support spawn ad pk servers anymore, mostly due to the fact that the typical player they attract is like “lololololOLOLOLololOLol noob u suck at pking, gtfo dis serva bitch”, however it’s also a rare occasion where someone actually puts some effort into advertising rather than just posting a few paragraphs and pictures of features that come with about every source download on this website.

My only complaint is the .tk domain, you should buy an actual webhost, it’s much faster, more reliable, and professional.

I might play this though[/quote]
I do plan to buy the things you have mentioned. However, this is more of a beta phase than anything. Once I’m ready for a large playerbase I assure you everything will be much more professional. I think you will enjoy this thread

http://ihybrid.createaforum.com/donating-14/what-do-i-plan-to-do-with-donation-money/msg15/#msg15

*note the site is iHybrid due to me changing the name very late into development. The site was already created before the name change

Read full topic
item.source: ~ GiraffesPK ~ [[ Spawn || Token ECO || Truly Instant Pking ]]

item.title: ~ GiraffesPK ~ [[ Spawn || Token ECO || Truly Instant Pking ]]
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

First off, let me say that I typically don’t support spawn ad pk servers anymore, mostly due to the fact that the typical player they attract is like “lololololOLOLOLololOLol noob u suck at pking, gtfo dis serva bitch”, however it’s also a rare occasion where someone actually puts some effort into advertising rather than just posting a few paragraphs and pictures of features that come with about every source download on this website.

My only complaint is the .tk domain, you should buy an actual webhost, it’s much faster, more reliable, and professional.

I might play this though

Read full topic

Giraffes are simply the greatest pkers to ever exist.
Proof:
[youtube]
Giraffe Fight - YouTube
[/youtube]

[color=red][size=14pt]Server Information:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
GiraffesPK is an Economic Spawn Server which uses tokens as currency. I have great plans to advance this server into one of the most unique spawn servers in existence. The idea is to have a server in which you can enjoy hassle free pking whilst still having content to enjoy. We also want to capture that feeling you experience after killing someone for a rare item. I mean come on, remember how you felt when you smited out your first whip in scape??

[color=red][size=14pt]Content Such As:[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[ul][li]Quests - [I]complete to unlock various things in-game such as items, permissions, etc.[/li]
[li]Skilling - [I]trade items obtained from skilling for tokens[/li]
[li]Minigames - [I]Earn points you can exchange for items, tokens, etc.[/li][/ul]

ax4h3.png762×496

[color=red][size=14pt]Game Guide:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[center]

[size=14pt]Korasi’s Quest Walkthrough:[/size]
~ GiraffesPK ~ The Korasi’s Quest Walkthrough - YouTube

[size=14pt]PvP Tokens:[/size]
Currently the only way to earn PvP Tokens is through Player Killing. Regular members will receive 5 tokens/kill and donators will receive 10 tokens/kill. However, this is only a release bonus. Soon the amount of tokens both regular members and donators receive will be cut in half.

Soon you will be able to earn PvP Tokens through skilling, minigames, questing etc.

You can purchase items from shops such as the PvP Token Shop with PvP Tokens

JUAu764×504

[size=14pt]Interactive Quest Tab:[/size]

Click buttons under Gear: to spawn different gear sets, potions, weapons etc.
Red circle = Shop NPCs
Yellow Circle = Quest NPCs
Blue Arrow = Portal to Jad
note Fire Cape is tradable

AziDX.png762×496

:: kdr
:: gameguide
:: changepassword
:: item
:: pickup
